publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2806 Mr John Swinney on behalf of the European and External Relations Committee:1st Report 2005 (Session 2) of the European and External Relations Committee, Report on an Inquiry into the Promotion of Scotland Worldwide: the Strategy, Policy and Activities of the Scottish Executive—That the Parliament notes the recommendations contained in the European and External Relations Committee’s 1st Report 2005 (Session 2) : An Inquiry into the Promotion of Scotland Worldwide: the Strategy, Policy and Activities of the Scottish Executive (SP Paper 297).

S2M-2806 Mr John Swinney on behalf of the European and External Relations Committee:1st Report 2005 (Session 2) of the European and External Relations Committee, Report on an Inquiry into the Promotion of Scotland Worldwide: the Strategy, Policy and Activities of the Scottish Executive—That the Parliament notes the recommendations contained in the European and External Relations Committee’s 1st Report 2005 (Session 2) : An Inquiry into the Promotion of Scotland Worldwide: the Strategy, Policy and Activities of the Scottish Executive (SP Paper 297).
